summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 FORD EDGE.  WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 40 MPH, THE CONTACT CRASHED INTO ANOTHER VEHICLE DIRECTLY IN THE FRONT CENTER.  THE FRONT END OF THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED, BUT NONE OF THE AIR BAGS DEPLOYED.  HE SUSTAINED MULTIPLE CONTUSIONS AND BRUISING TO DIFFERENT PARTS OF HIS BODY.  A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED.  THE VEHICLE IS CURRENTLY IN THE POSSESSION OF A LOCAL AUTO SHOP.  NUMEROUS PICTURES WERE TAKEN AFTER THE CRASH.  THE MANUFACTURER REFUSES TO SEND SOMEONE TO INSPECT THE VEHICLE AND DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE.  THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 1,000.
